price: (40) So We took him and his soldiers and threw them into the sea.[1104] So see how was the end of the wrongdoers.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: [1104]- Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā) caused them to leave all their worldly wealth behind and enter the sea in pursuit of the Children of Israel.  See 26:52-66.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-ẓālimīna
